definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
variant of 抽煙|抽烟[chou1 yan1]/to smoke (a cigarette, tobacco)
variant of 煙斗|烟斗[yan1 dou3]
nicotine/also written 菸鹼|菸碱[yan1 jian3]
variant of 煙蒂|烟蒂[yan1 di4]/cigarette butt

sentences.english: Five synthesis methods of the third generation nicotinic insecticide-dinotefuran are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了第三代菸鹼類殺蟲劑呋蟲胺的5種合成方法。

sentences.english: He has not quit smoking, but is holding down to three cigarettes a day.
sentences.chinese: 他並戒菸，已減到每天只抽三支菸了。

sentences.english: He always has a smoke after dinner, and makes the room smoky .
sentences.chinese: 他飯後總是吸支菸，弄得屋子滿是煙霧。

sentences.english: "He's crying because he wants a cigarette," said Diana, his mother.
sentences.chinese: “他哭是因爲他想要一支菸，”他母親黛安娜說。

sentences.english: Between the acts you go out for a smoke and a breath of fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 你在兩個節目之間出去抽支菸，呼吸一下新鮮空氣。

sentences.english: But for me, this was like 'only having a couple of cigarettes a week.
sentences.chinese: 但這對我來說就像“一星期只抽兩根菸”。

sentences.english: Then he bummed a cigarette and asked me for a light.
sentences.chinese: 爾後，他要了一支菸，向我借了個火兒。

sentences.english: I confine myself to five cigarettes a day.
sentences.chinese: 我限定自己每天只抽五支菸。

sentences.english: The hooligan stood leaning against the wall, cigarette between lips and scar on face.
sentences.chinese: 流氓斜倚着牆站着，嘴裏叼根菸，臉上一個刀疤。

sentences.english: A cigarette, a up and down the elevator, the dream of a brief dream of grandeur.
sentences.chinese: 一支菸，一場上下電梯，一枕黃粱的夢。

sentences.english: Believe that cigarette packaging rotogravure printing ink needs will increase.
sentences.chinese: 猜忌菸包不凸版油墨的需求也會因此補充。

sentences.english: Stub out that cigarette and make it your last.
sentences.chinese: 掐滅菸頭，讓它成爲你的最後一根菸。

sentences.english: This is the way how he became an inveterate smoker.
sentences.chinese: 這就是他如何成爲老菸槍的方法。

sentences.english: De you like smoking a cigarette before going to bed?
sentences.chinese: 你是否喜歡在上牀睡覺前抽支菸？

sentences.english: Jackie opened her bag and looked for a cigarette.‘Can I smoke?’
sentences.chinese: 傑基打開包找了支菸。“我可以抽嗎？”

sentences.english: He said that he would rather eat pickled vegetables, to save money to buy cigarettes smoking.
sentences.chinese: 他說，他寧願喫鹹菜，也要省下錢來買菸抽。

definition: variant of 抽煙|抽烟[chou1 yan1]/to smoke (a cigarette, tobacco)
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
variant of 嘗|尝[chang2]/to taste/to experience
to narrow one's eyes/to squint/(dialect) to take a nap
